import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {Form, Button, Col} from "react-bootstrap" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartActions' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PaymentScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() if(!shippingAddress){ navigate("/shipping") } const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = React.useState("PayPal") const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod({paymentMethod})) navigate("/placeorder") } return (

Payment Method

Select Method setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}>
) } export default PaymentScreen
